com.team23.weather.owm

Interface IOwmClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OwmClient

    public interface IOwmClient
    An IOwmClient is the primary client layer interface through which an application can query for data from the OpenWeatherMap API.
    Author:
    Saquib Mian
    See Also:
    Forecast, CompoundForecast, Location

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getApiKey() 
      java.lang.String getBaseUrl()
      By default this URL is set to "http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5"
      CompoundForecast getDailyForecast(Location location)
      Get the long-term (daily) forecast for the given location.
      CompoundForecast getForecast(Location location)
      Get the short-term (hourly) forecast for the given location.
      java.awt.Image getIcon(SkyCondition skyCondition)
      Gets an Image object representing the image of the sky condition

      Gets the full URL of the icon that indicates the SkyCondition

      Get the weather for the location specified.

      Search for the City given a query string.

      Sets the LocaleSettings object associated with this library

    • Method Detail

      • getApiKey

        java.lang.String getApiKey()
        Returns:
        the API key in use by the client

      • setApiKey

        void setApiKey(java.lang.String apiKey)
        Set the API key to be used by the library
        Parameters:
        apiKey - the new API key

      • getBaseUrl

        java.lang.String getBaseUrl()
        By default this URL is set to "http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5"
        Returns:
        the base URL of of this client library

      • setBaseUrl

        void setBaseUrl(java.lang.String baseUrl)
        Sets the base URL to which all subsequent API calls are made
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - the new base URL

      • getLocale

        LocaleSettings getLocale()
        Returns:
        the current LocaleSettings object associated with this library

      • setLocale

        void setLocale(LocaleSettings localeSettings)
        Sets the LocaleSettings object associated with this library
        Parameters:
        localeSettings - the new locale settings

      • searchForCity

        Location[] searchForCity(java.lang.String query)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Search for the City given a query string. This query string is usually in the format: "city,country".
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        a list of resulting Location object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is the query is empty or null

      • getWeather

        Forecast getWeather(Location location)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Get the weather for the location specified.
        Parameters:
        location - the location to get the weather for
        Returns:
        Forecast with as much data populated as the API returns
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if connection fails

      • getForecast

        CompoundForecast getForecast(Location location)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Get the short-term (hourly) forecast for the given location. This forecast will be returned according to this implementation defined in the OpenWeatherMap API, which at the time of this writing is 3-hour segments for 24-hours.
        Parameters:
        location - the location to get the hourly forecasts for
        Returns:
        a CompoundForecast object with the appropriate data filed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection failed

      • getDailyForecast

        CompoundForecast getDailyForecast(Location location)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Get the long-term (daily) forecast for the given location. This forecast will be returned according to this implementation defined in the OpenWeatherMap API, which at the time of this writing is 24-hour segments for 15 days.
        Parameters:
        location - the location to get the weather for
        Returns:
        a CompoundForecast object with the appropriate data filed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if connection fails

      • getIcon

        java.awt.Image getIcon(SkyCondition skyCondition)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Gets an Image object representing the image of the sky condition
        Parameters:
        skyCondition - the sky condition for which to get the image
        Returns:
        an Image object representing the image of the sky condition
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if connection fails

      • getIconUrl

        java.lang.String getIconUrl(SkyCondition skyCondition)
        Gets the full URL of the icon that indicates the SkyCondition
        Parameters:
        skyCondition - the sky condition for which to get the image url
        Returns:
        the full URL of the icon
